name: Aceternity UI
description: Beautiful Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion components for React/Next.js, designed for modern, animated landing pages.

components.name: 3d-card
components.description: Interactive card with 3D perspective transform on hover. Creates a depth effect where child elements appear to float above the card surface.

className.description: Tailwind classes for the inner card container.

containerClassName.description: Tailwind classes for the outer container/wrapper.

examples.title: 3D Product Card
examples.code:
Pro Plan

Perfect for growing teams.

components.useCase: Displaying products or features with a high-end 3D tilt effect on hover.
components.embeddingContext: 3D Card Effect creates an interactive card with perspective transform that tilts on hover. Also known as: perspective card, tilt card, floating card, hover card effect. Child elements appear to elevate above the surface on interaction. Built with framer-motion for smooth physics-based animations. Used for feature highlights, product showcases, or interactive galleries.

components.name: 3d-pin
components.description: 3D animated gradient pin used to highlight links or cards.

href.description: Optional link for the pinned item.

title.description: Label shown inside or near the pin.

examples.title: Pinned Product Link

components.useCase: Highlighting locations on a map or features on a diagram with an animated 3D pin.
components.embeddingContext: 3D animated gradient pin used to highlight links or cards. Related concepts: map, pin, location, 3d, marker, link. Primary use case: Highlighting locations on a map or features on a diagram with an animated 3D pin.

components.name: animated-modal
components.description: Accessible modal dialog with Framer Motion entrance and exit animations.

open.description: Controls whether the modal is visible.

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when open state changes.

initial.description: Initial motion state for the modal content.

animate.description: Target motion state when the modal is open.

backdropClassName.description: Tailwind classes for the fullscreen backdrop.

className.description: Tailwind classes for the modal panel container.

examples.title: Controlled Animated Modal
examples.code:
const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); <>

Aceternity Modal

Smooth entrance and exit animations using Framer Motion.

components.name: floating-dock
components.description: macOS-style animated dock navigation bar with magnification effect on hover. Smooth spring physics for natural feel.

examples.title: Bottom Nav Dock
examples.code:

  items={[
    { icon: HomeIcon, title: "Home" },
    { icon: StarIcon, title: "Features" }
  ]}
/>

components.useCase: A floating bottom navigation bar similar to macOS Dock, ideal for apps.
components.embeddingContext: Floating Dock is a macOS-style navigation bar with magnification effect. Also known as: mac dock, app dock, icon bar, magnifying menu. Features smooth spring physics animations and hover magnification. Icons scale up when hovered, creating a fluid, Apple-like experience. Best for app navigation, quick actions, or portfolio showcases.

keyProps.name: items
keyProps.type: Array<{ title: string; icon: ReactNode; href: string }>
